title.rendered: Full Zip Vertical Pocket Women’s Jacket

excerpt.rendered:
• Stand collar with smooth fleece lining to reduce friction.
  • Full-length zip with chin-saving zipper garage.
  • Vertical zip chest pocket.
  • Fleece-lined, zip hand-warmer pockets.
  • Interior, zip security pocket.
  • Hook-and-loop tab cuffs.
  • Droptail hemline with one-hand adjustable drawstring.
  • Fleece lining for improved warmth retention.
  • Embroidered and printed brandmarks.
  • Body: 100% polyester;
    Backing: 100% polyurethane;
    Lining 1: 100% polyester;
    Lining 2: 100% polyamide.
  • Machine wash and tumble dry.
